div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1544191516954 vc_row-has-fill vc_general vc_parallax vc_parallax-content-moving-fade js-vc_parallax-o-fade inner-container no-bmargin

div.p: Rhodes School for the Performing Arts is the only charter school to be designated as a Fine Arts Magnet School by the U.S Department of Education. RSPA provides an academically sound arts-rig curriculum that allows students to develop appreciation and skill in the fine arts.

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid gray-bg vc_custom_1544322803300 vc_row-has-fill vc_general vc_parallax vc_parallax-content-moving-fade js-vc_parallax-o-fade inner-container no-bmargin

p.em: I wanted to reach out to give Kudos to the Northwest campus for being a support to my daughter, Maci Wiley (5th Grade, Mrs. R. White) and myself. I’ve always been told that it takes a village to raise a kid and I’m overjoyed to say that Mrs. White and the rest of the teachers, faculty, and staff are just that! My daughter is an intelligent, gifted, happy and healthy little girl and I attribute some of that to her school life! Enrolling my daughter in Rhodes School for the Performing Arts – Northwest was the best decision I ever made!

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid red-bg vc_custom_1544324693610 vc_row-has-fill vc_general vc_parallax vc_parallax-content-moving-fade js-vc_parallax-o-fade inner-container no-bmargin
wpb_video_widget wpb_content_element vc_clearfix vc_video-aspect-ratio-169 vc_video-el-width-100 vc_video-align-left

p.strong: Your support means everything to the students at RSPA!

div.p: At RSPA, we believe in the power of a CREW. We’re always looking for opportunities to make RSPA the premier performing arts school in Houston, Harris County that produces critical thinkers and global leaders. Your donations to RSPA will provide opportunities for students today and generations to come.

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1544337574335 vc_row-has-fill vc_general vc_parallax vc_parallax-content-moving-fade js-vc_parallax-o-fade inner-container no-bmargin
vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1544337586479 vc_row-has-fill vc_general vc_parallax vc_parallax-content-moving-fade js-vc_parallax-o-fade inner-container no-bmargin

div.h3: A Leading Charter School in Houston

div.p: Don’t leave your child’s future up to chance. The Rhodes School operates according to a state charter with an emphasis on the performing arts and academic excellence. As a school of choice, our doors are open to several greater Houston school districts if you’re unhappy or underserved by your traditional public school. Charter schools are public, so your child can enjoy the educational benefit and personalized care of a small school without the burden of tuition.

div.h3: A Performing Arts School in Houston That Cares

div.p: As a fine arts magnet school of distinction, we operate on the principles of Scholarship, Leadership and Citizenship. In addition to being a performing arts elementary school and performing arts middle school in Houston, our mission is “To develop critical thinkers who have the character to lead.” Excellence in the studio, practice room, auditorium, and classroom will help put your child on a path towards fulfilling their potential in all walks of life.

div.h2: Ready to be part of the RSPA CREW?

div.class: wpb_single_image wpb_content_element vc_align_left floatleftimg no-bmargin has-hover-elem-anim hover-elem-anim-fade-in hover-elem-anim-speed-normal hover-anim-062d5b

div.div:
Rhodes School for the Performing Arts is a fine arts magnet school of distinction. We expand the educational choice of families with children Pre-K through 8th grade while providing increased opportunities for students. Founded on the principles of Scholarship, Leadership, and Citizenship, we now celebrate our tenth year in education.
Overall Grades offered NOW *PreK3-8th
PreK3 and PreK4 must meet eligibility requirements
Northshore: PreK3-7th
Channelview: PreK3-5th
Northwest: K-5
Humble: PreK3-8th
© 2017 Rhodes School for the Performing Arts. All Rights Reserved
